{LINK}
Best Regards,
{COMPANY}

Here is the invoice of {CURRENCY} {AMOUNT}
You can view the invoice online at:
{LINK}
Best Regards,
{COMPANY}
Looking forward to doing business with you.

You can view the invoice online at:
{LINK}
Best Regards,
{COMPANY}

fx_countries.value: South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands

fx_email_templates.subject: Registration successful
fx_email_templates.template_body:
Welcome to {SITE_NAME}
Thanks for joining {SITE_NAME}. We listed your sign in details below, make sure you keep them safe.
To open your {SITE_NAME} homepage, please follow this link:
{SITE_NAME} Account!
Link doesn't work? Copy the following link to your browser address bar:
{SITE_URL}
Your username: {USERNAME}
Your email address: {EMAIL}
Your password: {PASSWORD}
Have fun!
The {SITE_NAME} Team.

fx_email_templates.subject: Forgot Password
fx_email_templates.template_body:
New Password
Forgot your password, huh? No big deal.
To create a new password, just follow this link:

Create a new password
Link doesn't work? Copy the following link to your browser address bar:
{PASS_KEY_URL}


You received this email, because it was requested by a {SITE_NAME} user.

This is part of the procedure to create a new password on the system. If you DID NOT request a new password then please ignore this email and your password will remain the same.


Thank you,
The {SITE_NAME} Team

fx_email_templates.subject: Change Email
fx_email_templates.template_body:
New email address on {SITE_NAME}
You have changed your email address for {SITE_NAME}.
Follow this link to confirm your new email address:
Confirm your new email
Link doesn't work? Copy the following link to your browser address bar:
{NEW_EMAIL_KEY_URL}

Your email address: {NEW_EMAIL}

You received this email, because it was requested by a {SITE_NAME} user. If you have received this by mistake, please DO NOT click the confirmation link, and simply delete this email. After a short time, the request will be removed from the system.
Thank you,
The {SITE_NAME} Team

fx_email_templates.subject: Activate Account
fx_email_templates.template_body:
Welcome to {SITE_NAME}!

Thanks for joining {SITE_NAME}. We listed your sign in details below, make sure you keep them safe.

To verify your email address, please follow this link:
Finish your registration...
Link doesn't work? Copy the following link to your browser address bar:
{ACTIVATE_URL}

Please verify your email within {ACTIVATION_PERIOD} hours, otherwise your registration will become invalid and you will have to register again.


Your username: {USERNAME}
Your email address: {EMAIL}
Your password: {PASSWORD}

Have fun!
The {SITE_NAME} Team

fx_email_templates.subject: Reset Password
fx_email_templates.template_body:
New password on {SITE_NAME}

You have changed your password.
Please, keep it in your records so you don't forget it.

Your username: {USERNAME}
Your email address: {EMAIL}
Your new password: {NEW_PASSWORD}

Thank you,
The {SITE_NAME} Team

The {SITE_NAME} Team

fx_email_templates.subject: Ticket [TICKET_CODE] Response
fx_email_templates.template_body:
Ticket Response

A new response has been added to Ticket #{TICKET_CODE}

Ticket : #{TICKET_CODE}
Status : {TICKET_STATUS}

To see the response and post additional comments, click on the link below.

View Reply

Note: Do not reply to this email as this email is not monitored.

Regards
The {SITE_NAME} Team

fx_email_templates.subject: Ticket [TICKET_CODE] Closed
fx_email_templates.template_body:
Ticket Closed
Hi {REPORTER_EMAIL}

Ticket #{TICKET_CODE} has been closed by {STAFF_USERNAME}

Ticket : #{TICKET_CODE}
Status : {TICKET_STATUS}

Replies : {NO_OF_REPLIES}

To see the responses or open the ticket, click on the link below.

View Ticket

Note: Do not reply to this email as this email is not monitored.

Regards
The {SITE_NAME} Team

fx_updates.title: Cumulative bug fix update
fx_updates.description:
Changelog

- Fix: Invoice item delete 404 error
- Fix: Task editable by client through milestone
- Fix: Username color change for update notification only visible to admin
- Fix: Inheritance of language and locale to new users
- Fix: Display default language in dashboard chart
- Fix: Error in saving items because of extra field item_name_auto
- Fix: Dashboard avatars for unassigned tasks
- Fix: Calendar JS error when description contains single quote
- Fix: Main calendar showing all tasks on the project due date
- Fix: Typeahead script error
- Fix: Company update redirect error
- Fix: Login page not in default language
- Fix: Translated invoice status for staff and payment status for admins
- Fix: Insert item popup in estimates doesn't appear
- Fix: Line breaks in update description

fx_updates.title: Cumulative bug fix update 2
fx_updates.description:
Changelog

- Fix: mPDF hide item tax in invoices and estimates
- Fix: Changed all external links protocol to https
- Feature: Tooltips for main calendar
- Fix: Added currency symbol to all amounts in invoice
- Fix: Removed remote checks from updates page for faster loading
- Fix: Reversed previous changes in invoice status
- Fix: Reversed previous change in quantity number format
- Fix: Typeahead items 404 when there is no edit field
- Fix: Unassigned bug error
- Feature: Added Romanian currency
- Fix: Limit dashboard activities to 10
- Fix: dataTables empty translation
- Fix: Mobile menu hidden under elements
- Fix: Dashboard projects table row height issue
- Fix: Mobile menu hidden under elements
- Fix: Dashboard projects table row height issue
- Fix: User menu background in mobile view

fx_updates.title: UPDATED! Re-install! Version 1.7.3
fx_updates.description:
IMPORTANT

If you have problems with auto-update replace the file at
/application/modules/updates/views/modal/view_update.php
with the file in the archive view_update.zip and re-install

1. Back up your translations (second button in translations list)
2. After installation set the invoice logo size from Settings > Invoice Settings

Changelog

- Feature: Hide FO branding (Settings>Themes)
- Feature: Login title (Settings>Themes)
- Feature: Currency symbol position and decimal settings for currency/quantity/tax (Settings>System) - Feature: Estimate and invoice footer in PDF(Settings>Invoices/Estimates)
- Update: Added Croatian and Serbian language
- Fix: Customer online registration causing PHP errors when client is not assigned to a company
- Fix: Multicurrency amounts are converted to the default currency for home charts / currencies are auto-updated daily
- Fix: Duplicate labels in invoice list
- Fix: Followlocation error when safe_mode or open_basedir are enabled
- Fix: Translations showing wrong completed percentage and auth_tank strings

More small bug fixes and tweaks
